To get past GFWL just click on "create new account" and then "make an offline profile" (think it could be local dont rember)

Just press "Esc" on this, create offline profile ...

There is a virus in that thing, at least it behaves like one... I use ESET NOD32 v5, i download a lot of game which it thinks the executable is a virus so i created an exception in NOD32 for the «Play.exe» file, when i tried to lauch it my AV automatically quarantined and i saw that in the mean time, the Play.exe created multiple «is-XXXXX.tmp» with the exact same size as the Play.exe... i would wait for another release if i were you guys, just saying.

Please help me! I run the game, and it says "Could not launch game. Please, make sure another instance of game is not running" (everything else is closed, antivirus protection too) Sorry for my eng, if i make some mistakes.

what markofbear said.  click "create new acct" then some where in the description is a link to "create local acct" or "local profile" or something like that.  click that enter your nickname then gtg.  least thats how it worked for me

Having same trouble as "Arial1070"
1.- AV inactive.
2.- Install as admin.
3.- Install extra software.
4.- Double click game icon (Icon looks weird though)
Message pops-up: "Could not launch game. Please, make sure another instance of game is not running"
5.- Tried running FCEngine-GFWL.exe alone and it loads Steam client.

TO THOSE WHO CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO CREATE AN OFFLINE PROFILE:

The one thing nobody is mentioning here is how to get to the menu that lets you do this. Once you're on the title screen of the game, hit Esc to close the current GFWL box, then hit the HOME button on your keyboard. The option to create a profile will be there. Somewhere in the description of creating a profile will be a link to creating a local profile. That's it!
